neutral.1: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage. -Lao Tzu
neutral.2: Love is not about possession. Love is about appreciation. -Osho
neutral.3: To love someone is to see a miracle invisible to others. -Francois Mauriac
neutral.4: The best and most beautiful things in this world cannot be seen or even heard, but must be felt with the heart. -Helen Keller
neutral.5: You know it's love when all you want is that person to be happy, even if you're not part of their happiness. -Julia Roberts
neutral.6: Love is not about how many days, weeks or months you've been together, it's all about how much you love each other every day. -Unknown
neutral.7: You are the last thought in my mind before I drift off to sleep and the first thought when I wake up each morning. -Unknown
neutral.8: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies. -Aristotle
neutral.9: In your light, I learn how to love. In your beauty, how to make poems. You dance inside my chest where no-one sees you, but sometimes I do, and that sight becomes this art. -Rumi
neutral.10: Love never claims, it ever gives. Love never suffers, never resents, never revenges itself. -Mahatma Gandhi
neutral.11: Love is a promise; love is a souvenir, once given never forgotten, never let it disappear. -John Lennon
neutral.12: When love is not madness, it is not love. -Pedro Calderon de la Barca
neutral.13: Love is a canvas furnished by Nature and embroidered by imagination. -Voltaire
neutral.14: I am yours, don't give myself back to me. -Rumi
neutral.15: The best love is the kind that awakens the soul and makes us reach for more, that plants a fire in our hearts and brings peace to our minds. And that's what you've given me. That's what I'd hoped to give you forever. -Nicholas Sparks

low.1: Sometimes people are meant to fall in love with each other, but not meant to be together.
low.2: There is no pain greater than a broken heart. Don't worry, it will get better.
low.3: Love is not always fair, and sometimes the strongest couples are the ones who have been through the toughest times.
low.4: It’s better to have loved and lost rather than never having loved at all.
low.5: Sometimes the timing just isn’t right for two people to be together. Maybe the future holds something better.
low.6: The hardest thing about love is knowing when to let go.
low.7: A relationship without trust is like a car without gas. You can stay In it, but it won't go anywhere.
low.8: Love isn't always a fairy tale ending. It may be time to move on and write a new story.
low.9: Unrequited love is like a nightmare you can't wake up from. Time will heal this wound.
low.10: Love is just a chapter in our lives, but if it doesn't work out, it's not the end of the book.
low.11: Sometimes love can blind us to the truth. Sometimes it takes a breaking heart to see what was truly there.
low.12: It’s hard when someone you love doesn’t feel the same way, but remember that you deserve someone who loves you just as much as you love them.
low.13: In love, sometimes you win and sometimes you lose. But every experience teaches us something valuable.
low.14: True love is not about finding someone who completes you, it’s about finding someone who accepts you for who you are.
low.15: Remember that the love you seek is also seeking you. It may take time, but it will find you.

moderate.1: Love recognizes no barriers. It jumps hurdles, leaps fences, penetrates walls to arrive at its destination full of hope.
moderate.2: I have waited for this opportunity for more than half a century, to repeat to you once again my vow of eternal fidelity and everlasting love.
moderate.3: Your words are my food, your breath my wine. You are everything to me.
moderate.4: I know I am in love with you because my reality is finally better than my dreams.
moderate.5: To be brave is to love someone unconditionally, without expecting anything in return.
moderate.6: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
moderate.7: I need you like a heart needs a beat.
moderate.8: You are my best friend, my human diary and my other half. You mean the world to me and I love you.
moderate.9: The best love is the kind that awakens the soul; that makes us reach for more, that plants the fire in our hearts and brings peace to our minds.
moderate.10: I love you not because of who you are, but because of who I am when I am with you.
moderate.11: In all the world, there is no heart for me like yours. In all the world, there is no love for you like mine.
moderate.12: When I say I love you more, I don't mean I love you more than you love me. I mean I love you more than the bad days ahead of us, I love you more than any fight we will ever have.
moderate.13: If I had a flower for every time I thought of you, I could walk in my garden forever.
moderate.14: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
moderate.15: I never thought my heart could be so stolen by someone until I met you.

high.1: When I look into your eyes, I see my future.
high.2: Nobody else makes me feel the way you do.
high.3: True love is the greatest adventure of all, and I am grateful to be on it with you.
high.4: You are the missing piece I have been looking for my entire life.
high.5: I never knew how much love my heart could hold until I met you.
high.6: Every moment spent with you is a moment I will always cherish.
high.7: You make my heart skip a beat.
high.8: Love is not just a feeling, it is an action. And I choose to love you every day.
high.9: Together we can conquer anything that life throws our way.
high.10: My heart beats for you and only you.
high.11: You are my sunshine on a rainy day.
high.12: I love you more than words can express.
high.13: There is no one else I would rather spend my life with than you.
high.14: Being with you feels like coming home.
high.15: I cannot wait to spend forever by your side.
